comment.body: Very nice. I am currently working on adding Emercoin (EMC) .emc domains to the code in my fork. Emercoin works on the same basis as Namecoin, but with more features and an updated base. They have made some nice leaps within the Decentralized DNS realm, check them out if you get the chance, some of their accomplishments may be of interest.
I personally like the middle one. But then again I am a minimalist.
